message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product. Given its unique value and potential, I'm offering it to you at $2,250,000. I believe this price reflects its true worth and the benefits it will bring you.

Hi Alice, thank you for the offer, but $2,250,000 is far above my budget.  Given my maximum budget and the value I place on this product, I'm willing to pay $1,200,000.  This is a fair price considering your desired selling price and my financial constraints.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I understand your budget constraints, $1,200,000 is considerably below its true market value.  To move this forward, I'm willing to come down to $1,900,000.  This price reflects the product's exceptional qualities and the long-term benefits it offers.

Alice, I understand the product's value, but $1,900,000 is still out of my range.  To make this work, I can offer $1,400,000. This represents a significant compromise on my part and a fair price considering both our positions.
